inclusion.criterion: Greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stenotic Airway Disease (laryngeal, subglottic, distal tracheal or bronchial)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients without capacity to consent for themselves
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of significant laryngotracheal traumatic injury.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Endotracheal intubation 2 years prior to presentation.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of caustic or thermal injury to the laryngotracheal complex.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been diagnosed with Wegener's granulomatosis and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
